name: Random Spanish
description:
Welcome to Random Spanish!

The purpose of this tool is to allow you to practice your Spanish Grammar with randomly generated sentences. Because the sentences are randomly generated, there is more replay value with Random Spanish than with simple flash cards or other tools with individually crafted prompts.

Check back regularly as more grammar (and vocabulary) is constantly being added to this tool.

Please feel free to comment below with suggestions on new content.

Any and all donations are welcome!

You can read more about this tool here.

You can learn how to get data from the game here.
